Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2018 06:15PM - edited Apr 20, 2018 06:16PM by Teacup7 Hopeful AC, I haven't put any creams on my back. I have been putting them on my chest, breast, side and armpit. I know two people who had BC before I was diagnosed and they both said be sure and put lotion on the side and armpit area. HTH. 15/30 rads
